card.text: Flying This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control. When this creature enters, up to one target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

card.name: Sleepwalk
card.text: You gain control of target opponent during that player's next turn. They skip the untap step of that turn. After that turn, that player takes an extra turn. Exile Sleepwalk.

card.name: Lifeblood Ritual
card.text: Choose one— • Up to two target creatures you don't control each get -X/-X until end of turn. • Return up to two target creature cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Autumnal Wish
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. You may play a card you own from outside the game this turn. If that card has mana value less than the sacrificed creature's mana value, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Encroaching Convergence
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Equinox {3}{R}{R} (If you cast this spell from your hand for its equinox cost, exile it. At your next upkeep, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Prossa, Midnight Flame
card.text: Flying {R}: Prossa gets +1/+0 for each spell you've cast this turn. When its power becomes 12 this way, you may exile the top half of your library, rounded down. You may play those cards this turn.

card.name: Jack's Ire
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control. Jack's Ire deals X damage to each creature.

card.name: Dusklight Frolicking
card.text: Target opponent may have Dusklight Frolicking deal 4 damage to them. If that player doesn't, you draw three cards. Equinox {3}{R}{R} (If you cast this spell from your hand for its equinox cost, exile it. At your next upkeep, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Starscape Phoenix
card.text: Flying Nocturnal {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its nocturnal cost. If you do, it enters tapped with a stun counter on it. Remove a stun counter instead of untapping.) When this creature dies, until the end of your next turn, you may cast it from your graveyard for its nocturnal cost.

card.name: Approach the Eye
card.text: You don't lose unspent red mana as steps and phases end. At the beginning of your upkeep, this enchantment deals 1 damage to you for each unspent red mana you have. Sacrifice a creature: Add {R}.

card.name: Condemned Lupine
card.text: As long as you've cast two or more spells this turn, this creature has haste. Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Moonlight Witch
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Reap — {3}{R}: Discard your hand, then draw two cards. (Activate this ability only once each turn as a sorcery. It costs {0} if a creature died this turn.)

card.name: Horizon Eater

card.name: Druidic Summons
card.text: Creatures you control have trample. At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a might counter on target creature you control without one. It has base power and toughness 8/8 for as long as it has a might counter on it.

card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that's white, blue, black, or red, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Nocturnal {G} (You may cast this spell for its nocturnal cost. If you do, it enters tapped with a stun counter on it. Remove a stun counter instead of untapping.)

card.name: Eldritch Deluge
card.text: Reveal the top X cards of your library. For each artifact, creature, or land card revealed this way, if it has mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield tapped with a stun counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Surula, Swarm's Song
card.text: Trample Whenever another nontoken creature you control enters, create an X/X green Spirit creature token with trample, where X is that creature's power.

card.name: Portal Summoning
card.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped with a stun counter on it. Equinox {4}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell from your hand for its equinox cost, exile it. At your next upkeep, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Things in the Wake
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card with mana value less than that spell's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Otherwise, you may put that card into your graveyard.

card.name: Adler, Midnight Architect
card.text: [+1]: Up to one target creature you control gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of your end step, return it to its owner's hand. [-2]: Discard your hand, then draw X cards, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn. [-6]: You get an emblem with "You may cast spells with mana value 3 or less without paying their mana costs."

card.name: Aminatou, Loreweaver
card.text: [+1]: Exile up to one other permanent you control until Aminatou leaves the battlefield. [0]: Return each permanent card exiled with Aminatou to the battlefield under your control. You gain life equal to their total mana value. [-X]: Exile target nontoken creature with mana value X or less.

card.name: Deeptomb Caller

card.text: Discard your hand, then draw X cards. When you do, you may cast a spell with mana value X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
